entry.name: ROCKET_STATE_TEST
entry.description: Rocket is unarmed and in test mode before launch (actuator drivers are disabled).

entry.name: ROCKET_STATE_READY
entry.description: Rocket is armed and ready for launch (actuator drivers are enabled).

entry.name: ROCKET_STATE_COUNTDOWN
entry.description: Rocket is counting down to ignition.

message.name: ROCKET_STATE
message.description: The rocket state message shows the current rocket state.
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude of the number.
